attributes.action: Make debating all petitions that reach over 100,000 signatures mandatory.
attributes.additional_details: At the time of writing, two petitions with more than twice the required number of signatures to validate them for debate have been dismissed in what comes off as an arrogant and out-of-touch manner.  Our government must respect public opinion and up-to-date scientific evidence on matters that warrant enough attention to gather over a hundred thousand supporters, and encourage debate on these matters rather than dismissing them.
attributes.background: A number of petitions on the Government's petition website that have reached over 100,000 signatures have been dismissed with nothing but a few paragraphs of explanation without explicitly cited evidence. The public feels that this approach undermines the meaning of democracy.
